樳字的基本解释

樳
xún
见“桪”。

樳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xún］
［《廣韻》徐林切，平侵，邪。］
“桪1”的繁体字。
传说中的大树。参见“樳木”。

樳字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樳； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页551第20
【唐韻】徐林切【集韻】【韻會】徐心切，?音尋。【唐韻】木名，似槐。【集韻】以爲炭，鍊生鐵，一烹乃熟。亦作尋。【山海經】尋木長千里，在句纓南，生河上西北。【郭璞贊】眇眇尋木，生於河邊。疎枝千里，上干雲天。【左思·吳都賦】西蜀之於東吳，小大之相絕也。亦猶疎林螢耀，而與夫樳木龍燭也。○按樳與梣，音同物異。樳，木之最大者。《正字通》同梣，似誤。

樳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
樳字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［xún］
["Guangyun" Xu Linqie, flat invasion, evil. ]
Traditional characters for "桪1".
The legendary tree. See "Yu Mu".
樳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　樳; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 551 20
[Tang Yun] Xu Linqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Xu Xinqie, search for sound. [Tang Yun] Wooden name, resembling locust tree. [Jiyun] thought that charcoal, chain pig iron, once cooked is cooked. Also find. [Shanhaijing] Looking for woods for thousands of miles, in the south of Juying, the river goes to the northwest. [Guo Puzan] Sui Sui Xunmu was born by the river. Nine branches of thousands of miles, up to dry sky. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] The Western Shu is from the Dongwu, and the small and the big are unique. It is also like a firefly in the forest, and a candle with her husband and a dragon. ○Press 樳 and 梣, the sound is the same.樳, the largest of the woods. "Zhengzitong" is the same, it seems wrong.
